    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder()

    • Method Detail

      • setActions

        public NotificationOptions.Builder setActions(List<String> actions,
                                              int[] compatActionIndices)
        Sets at most 4 actions to show in the Notification, and at most 3 indices to the actions to show in the compat view. Set null to use default UI that shows all the actions in NotificationOptions.NOTIFICATION_ACTIONS. The default value is null.
        Parameters:
        actions - The list of actions, defined in NotificationOptions.NOTIFICATION_ACTIONS.
        compatActionIndices - Indices of the actions in actions list, which will be shown in the compat view.

      • setPauseDrawableResId

        public NotificationOptions.Builder setPauseDrawableResId(@DrawableRes
                                                         int resId)
        Sets the resource ID of the icon that indicates "pause". If set to 0 then a default drawable will be used. The default value is 0.
        Parameters:
        resId - drawable resource id

      • setPlayDrawableResId

        public NotificationOptions.Builder setPlayDrawableResId(@DrawableRes
                                                        int resId)
        Sets the resource ID of the icon that indicates "play". If set to 0 then a default drawable will be used. The default value is 0.
        Parameters:
        resId - drawable resource id

      • setSkipPrevDrawableResId

        public NotificationOptions.Builder setSkipPrevDrawableResId(@DrawableRes
                                                            int resId)
        Sets the resource ID of the icon that indicates NotificationOptions.ACTION_PREV. If set to 0 then a default drawable will be used. The default value is 0.
        Parameters:
        resId - drawable resource id

      • setSkipNextDrawableResId

        public NotificationOptions.Builder setSkipNextDrawableResId(@DrawableRes
                                                            int resId)
        Sets the resource ID of the icon that indicates NotificationOptions.ACTION_NEXT. If set to 0 then a default drawable will be used. The default value is 0.
        Parameters:
        resId - drawable resource id

      • setClearDrawableResId

        public NotificationOptions.Builder setClearDrawableResId(@DrawableRes
                                                         int resId)
        Sets the resource ID of the icon that indicates NotificationOptions.ACTION_CLEAR. If set to 0 then a default drawable will be used. The default value is 0.
        Parameters:
        resId - drawable resource id

      • setSmallIconResId

        public NotificationOptions.Builder setSmallIconResId(@DrawableRes
                                                     int resId)
        Sets the resource ID of the small icon. This value will be set to NotificationCompat.Builder#setSmallIcon(int). If set to 0 then a default drawable will be used. The default value is 0.
        Parameters:
        resId - drawable resource id

      • setLargeIcon

        public NotificationOptions.Builder setLargeIcon(Bitmap bitmap)
        Sets the bitmap of large icon. This value will be set to NotificationCompat.Builder#setLargeIcon(Bitmap). If set to null then the poster image of video will be used. The default value is null.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - the bitmap of large icon

      • setColor

        public NotificationOptions.Builder setColor(int color)
        Sets the color of Notification. This value will be set to NotificationCompat.Builder#setColor(int). The default value is 0.
        Parameters:
        color - color in ColorInt

      • setTargetClassName

        public NotificationOptions.Builder setTargetClassName(String className)
        Sets the name of the Activity that will be launched when user clicks the content area of the Notification. If set to null then clicking the Notification will not launch any Activity. The default value is null.
        Parameters:
        className - class name of Activity

      • build

        public NotificationOptions build()
                          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Builds a Notification by this builder.
        Returns:
        Notification
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException
